website_summaries.verdict: A compact people-powered espresso machine that is easy to both use and clean.
pros: Comes with a filter basket brush, cotton travel bag, ebook, and user manual
cons: Some buyers say this isn't the most durable option, with the pump breaking or leaking fairly quickly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect espresso
customer_reviews.text: Have used my MiPress ,on a trip to the Bay Area, for 2 weeks. A Step by step diagram would be helpful, since there are a number of ‘rotations ‘. Remove the bottom cup, before pumping. My espresso has tasted perfect, with nice crema & no plastic aftertaste! I do tamp gently on the coffee basket, since I like it strong. MiPress added that the first few pumps provide the strongest flavor.

product_meta.title: MINI ESPRESSO PUMP for people who love coffee – ESPRESSO MAKER PORTABLE – MANUAL COFFEE MACHINE – filter basket brush - travel bag – e-book
product_meta.description:
Have the authentic coffee pleasure anytime and anywhere with MiPress, a small, compact and clever espresso maker which can give you an excellent espresso with crema.
It is easy, fun, no batteries, no cables, just your excellent shot from your portable espresso machine.
This mini portable espresso maker:

 * Is small indeed (only 7.17 inch tall), very easy to carry in any situation
 * Comes in an elegant gift box (7.87 x 3.94 x 2.95 inch
 * Comes with courtesy e-book, where you can find detailed information about using MiPress and a journey into the coffee world and the art of making your perfect espresso.
 * Comes with User Manual
 * Comes with complementary cotton carry bag and coffee brush.

Use the coffee brush anytime you need to clean MiPress’ filter or when you don’t have the means to wash it.
So simple operating steps!  * Grind your coffee blend
 * Place it in the filter
 * Tamper it softly using the included spoon
 * Fix the coffee maker head over the filter
 * Add hot water in the water tank
 * Fix the water tank in the coffee maker and pump the piston for few times (for a ristretto) or more times (for a longer shot).

To avoid spilling hot water please make sure the water tank is properly fixed before you continue. You do that by turning MiPress around its vertical axis and visually checking if the water tank is evenly screwed into the body.
As MiPress is not an electrically powered machine, its body temperature will be the one of the environment. Should you find the coffee temperature low, run hot water through it once before preparing your delightful espresso.
MiPress is a high quality product and your satisfaction is the most important for us. You have a 1 year warranty coming to support our commitment for quality and customer satisfaction .
